title: 手表显示图标分别代表什么意思？
answer:
荣耀小K界面图标介绍如下：
序号 图标 描述
1 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121114)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121115) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121116) 时间显示
2 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121117) 手表二维码显示
3 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121118) IMEI号和MAC地址
4 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121119)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121120)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121121) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121122) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121123) 语音通话
5 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121124) 添加好友
6 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121125)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121126)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121127) 换皮肤、主题更换
7 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121128)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121129) 索要奖励
8 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121130)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121131) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121132) 目标设定
9 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121133)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121134) 摇一摇加好友
10 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121135) 通讯录
11 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121136) SOS紧急呼叫
12 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121137) 在线升级
13 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121138) 低电量提醒
14 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121139)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121140) SIM提醒
15 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121141)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121142) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121143) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=121144) 爱心提醒
